tour_name: Portuguese Passion: Lisbon, Algarve & Douro Valley

sections.title: Lisbon: A Romantic Beginning
sections.content: Begin your Portuguese adventure in Lisbon, immersing yourselves in the city's vibrant culture and historic charm. Explore iconic neighborhoods like Bairro Alto and Chiado, hand-in-hand, discovering hidden gems and savoring authentic Portuguese pastries. Embark on a private sunset cruise along the Tagus River, complete with champagne and stunning views of the city's skyline. Visit the magnificent Jerónimos Monastery and Belém Tower, symbols of Portugal's golden age. Indulge in Lisbon's lively nightlife, discovering intimate Fado houses and romantic restaurants.

sections.title: Algarve: Coastal Bliss & Sunset Romance
sections.content: Escape to the sun-kissed shores of the Algarve. Spend your days relaxing at a luxurious 5-star resort, Octant Vila Monte, where you can unwind in style. Enjoy beach activities, from leisurely strolls along the golden sands to adventurous water sports. Embark on a romantic sunset cruise, savoring local wines as you watch the sun dip below the horizon. Explore the historic town of Sagres, steeped in maritime history and offering breathtaking coastal views. Delight in fresh seafood at a waterfront restaurant, experiencing the authentic flavors of the Algarve.

sections.title: Douro Valley: Wine, Views & Intimate Moments
sections.content: Journey into the heart of the Douro Valley, a UNESCO World Heritage site renowned for its picturesque vineyards and world-class wines. Check in at the Six Senses Douro Valley, a sanctuary of wellness and relaxation. Indulge in couples' spa treatments and private wine tastings, savoring the region's exceptional vintages. Explore the valley's charming quintas (wine estates), learning about the art of winemaking and enjoying breathtaking views. Embark on a scenic train ride along the Douro River, taking in the stunning landscapes. Indulge in romantic private dinners at some of the region's excellent restaurants, savoring regional delicacies and creating unforgettable memories together. Perhaps even explore a Michelin star restaurant, to have an elevated experience.
